column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: judge. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```@prefix : <http://www.example.com/#> .@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .:Judge rdf:type owl:Class .:hasName rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Judge ;    rdfs:range xsd:string .:SpecializesIn rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Judge ;    rdfs:range :FieldOfLaw .:FieldOfLaw rdf:type owl:Class .:SitsIn rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Judge ;    rdfs:range :Court .:Court rdf:type owl:Class .:EmployedBy rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Judge ;    rdfs:range :Institution .:Institution rdf:type owl:Class .:CompletedEducationAt rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Judge ;    rdfs:range :EducationalInstitution.:EducationalInstitution rdf:type owl:Class .:hasExperience rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;    rdfs:domain :Judge ;    rdfs:range xsd:nonNegativeInteger .```
